title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
OB: When restarting build 20021001, after removing the welcome line in prefstore.ini of the workbench metadata, the user should be able to get a welcome page. Clicking on any link in the welcome page should execute the appropriate action. However, the clicked link is not selected when the user returns to the welcome page. It would be beneficial to have the links selected when clicked to provide more context to the user when they return to the welcome page. The ProductInfoDialog dialog already implements this behavior.
